sections.text: group; duties.The work group shall examine and make recommendations to the department regarding the workforce training needs of the nuclear and hydrogen industries and provide an opportunity for collaboration of such industries with the Nebraska community college system and Nebraska state college system to develop education training courses.SourceLaws 2023, LB565, ยง 39.

66-2306.Work group; duties.

The work group shall examine and make recommendations to the department regarding the workforce training needs of the nuclear and hydrogen industries and provide an opportunity for collaboration of such industries with the Nebraska community college system and Nebraska state college system to develop education training courses.

SourceLaws 2023, LB565, ยง 39.
